document_data.name: The Spice of Life
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the Spice of Life
document_data.mainbody: The '''Spice of Life''' was an [[herb]] and [[spice]] shop located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located in south Zhentil Keep in the western section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] in front of the [[River Trail Gate]] on [[Slingshot Way]] and [[Twilight Street]].
document_data.Activities: The shop's selection of herbs and spices was truly impressive. In addition to common items, the shop carried exotic wares from [[Kozakura]], the [[Moonshae Isles]], [[Maztica]], and [[Zakhara]]. Furthermore, anything not in stock could be ordered.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Spice of Life was owned by a [[halfling]] named [[Ascot Stumblefoot]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
